name: Blazing Pig
description:
https://vargmurtter.itch.io - game designer

## Help!
Help the pig fight off insidious farmers in this beautiful endless rogue-like shooter game!
- Choose one of three weapons
- Go through an infinite number of waves
- Upgrade your stats

The poor pig fell into a trap. They want to send him to a meat factory! Urgently save poor pig!

Made for Ludum Dare 46
